entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, is mentioned as the one who has to complete his first task. He is described as standing up and leaving the Great Hall with Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall, a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, is mentioned as hurrying over to Harry in the Great Hall. She looks anxious and puts her hand on Harry's shoulder.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, is mentioned as whispering good luck to Harry.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall walks Harry down the stone steps and out into the cold November afternoon.
Hermione whispers good luck to Harry.
